useJsonImportAttributes.description:
Description

Enforces the use ofwith { type: "json" }for JSON module imports.
ECMAScript modules can import JSON modules. However, the specific import assertionwith { type: "json" }is required to inform the JavaScript runtime that the imported file should be parsed as JSON.
Omitting this assertion can lead to runtime errors or misinterpretation of the imported module.
This rule ensures that all imports of.jsonfiles include this assertion.
useJsonImportAttributes.option: This rule has no specific options.
